duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, maintain, and repair RF communication equipment and systems.
Perform signal analysis and troubleshoot technical issues in wireless communication systems.
Calibrate and test RF devices and antennas to ensure optimal performance and functionality.
Conduct circuit analysis and diagnose equipment malfunctions for effective repair and maintenance.
Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations in RF technology and communication systems.
Provide technical support and assistance to team members and clients in addressing RF communication challenges.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in Electrical Engineering, Telecommunications, or related field (Bachelor's preferred)
